channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Ali Jafari
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Ali Jafari

item.title: Python Folium Mapping
item.description: Making a mechanism to be able to show your data on maps using Python and Folium. In this way you can make a file of your prefered location Coordinates using online Web services and then use them in as a json file with your code to visualize your data over the specified areas . About Folium : Folium is a powerful Python library that helps you create several types of Leaflet maps.
